  76   
  77          """ Constructor 
  78   
  79              @param manager: the resource controller 
  80              @param prefix: prefix of the resource name (=module name) 
  81              @param name: name of the resource (without prefix) 
  82              @param id: record ID (or list of record IDs) 
  83              @param uid: record UID (or list of record UIDs) 
  84              @param filter: filter query (DAL resources only) 
  85              @param url_vars: dictionary of URL query variables 
  86              @param parent: the parent resource 
  87              @param components: component name (or list of component names) 
  88              @param storage: URL of the data store, None for DAL 
  89              @param debug: whether to write debug messages to stderr or not 
  90              @type debug: bool 
  91   
  92          """ 
  93   
  94          assert manager is not None, "Undefined Resource Manager" 
  95          self.__manager = manager 
  96   
  97          self.ERROR = self.__manager.ERROR 
  98   
  99          if debug is None: 
 100              self.__debug = self.__manager.debug 
 101          else: 
 102              self.__debug = debug 
 103   
 104          self.__permit = self.__manager.auth.shn_has_permission 
 105          self.__accessible = self.__manager.auth.shn_accessible_query 
 106   
 107          self.prefix = prefix 
 108          self.name = name 
 109          self.url_vars = None 
 110   
 111          self.__query = None 
 112          self.__length = None 
 113          self.__multiple = True 
 114   
 115          self.__set = None 
 116          self.__ids = [] 
 117          self.__uids = [] 
 118   
 119          self.__bind(storage) 
 120   
 121          self.components = Storage() 
 122          self.parent = parent 
 123   
 124          if self.parent is None: 
 125              self.__attach(select=components) 
 126              self.build_query(id=id, uid=uid, filter=filter, url_vars=url_vars) 
 127   
 128          self.__files = Storage() 
 129   
 130          self.__handler = Storage(options=self.__get_options, 
 131                                   fields=self.__get_fields, 
 132                                   export_tree=self.__get_tree, 
 133                                   import_tree=self.__put_tree)

 239 -    def build_query(self, id=None, uid=None, filter=None, url_vars=None): 

 240   
 241          """ Query builder 
 242   
 243              @param id: record ID or list of record IDs to include 
 244              @param uid: record UID or list of record UIDs to include 
 245              @param filter: filtering query (DAL only) 
 246              @param url_vars: dict of URL query variables 
 247   
 248          """ 
 249   
 250          # Initialize 
 251          self.clear() 
 252          self.clear_query() 
 253   
 254          xml = self.__manager.xml 
 255   
 256          if url_vars: 
 257              url_query = self.__manager.url_query(self, url_vars) 
 258              if url_query: 
 259                  self.url_vars = url_vars 
 260          else: 
 261              url_query = Storage() 
 262   
 263          if self.__storage is None: 
 264   
 265              deletion_status = self.__manager.DELETED 
 266   
 267              self.__multiple = True # multiple results expected by default 
 268   
 269              # Master Query 
 270              if self.__accessible is not None: 
 271                  master_query = self.__accessible("read", self.table) 
 272              else: 
 273                  master_query = (self.table.id > 0) 
 274   
 275              self.__query = master_query 
 276   
 277              # Component Query 
 278              if self.parent: 
 279   
 280                  parent_query = self.parent.get_query() 
 281                  if parent_query: 
 282                      self.__query = self.__query & parent_query 
 283   
 284                  component = self.parent.components.get(self.name, None) 
 285                  if component: 
 286                      pkey = component.pkey 
 287                      fkey = component.fkey 
 288                      self.__multiple = component.get("multiple", True) 
 289                      join = self.parent.table[pkey] == self.table[fkey] 
 290                      if str(self.__query).find(str(join)) == -1: 
 291                          self.__query = self.__query & (join) 
 292   
 293                  if deletion_status in self.table.fields: 
 294                      remaining = (self.table[deletion_status] == False) 
 295                      self.__query = self.__query & remaining 
 296   
 297              # Primary Resource Query 
 298              else: 
 299   
 300                  if id or uid: 
 301                      if self.name not in url_query: 
 302                          url_query[self.name] = Storage() 
 303   
 304                  # Collect IDs 
 305                  if id: 
 306                      if not isinstance(id, (list, tuple)): 
 307                          self.__multiple = False # single result expected 
 308                          id = [id] 
 309                      id_queries = url_query[self.name].get("id", Storage()) 
 310   
 311                      ne = id_queries.get("ne", []) 
 312                      eq = id_queries.get("eq", []) 
 313                      eq = eq + [v for v in id if v not in eq] 
 314   
 315                      if ne and "ne" not in id_queries: 
 316                          id_queries.ne = ne 
 317                      if eq and "eq" not in id_queries: 
 318                          id_queries.eq = eq 
 319   
 320                      if "id" not in url_query[self.name]: 
 321                          url_query[self.name]["id"] = id_queries 
 322   
 323                  # Collect UIDs 
 324                  if uid: 
 325                      if not isinstance(uid, (list, tuple)): 
 326                          self.__multiple = False # single result expected 
 327                          uid = [uid] 
 328                      uid_queries = url_query[self.name].get(self.__manager.UID, Storage()) 
 329   
 330                      ne = uid_queries.get("ne", []) 
 331                      eq = uid_queries.get("eq", []) 
 332                      eq = eq + [v for v in uid if v not in eq] 
 333   
 334                      if ne and "ne" not in uid_queries: 
 335                          uid_queries.ne = ne 
 336                      if eq and "eq" not in uid_queries: 
 337                          uid_queries.eq = eq 
 338   
 339                      if self.__manager.UID not in url_query[self.name]: 
 340                          url_query[self.name][self.manager.__UID] = uid_queries 
 341   
 342                  # URL Queries 
 343                  for rname in url_query: 
 344   
 345                      if rname == self.name: 
 346                          table = self.table 
 347                      elif rname in self.components: 
 348                          component = self.components[rname] 
 349                          table = component.resource.table 
 350                          pkey = component.pkey 
 351                          fkey = component.fkey 
 352   
 353                          join = (self.table[pkey]==table[fkey]) 
 354                          self.__query = self.__query & join 
 355   
 356                          if deletion_status in table.fields: 
 357                              remaining = (table[deletion_status] == False) 
 358                              self.__query = self.__query & remaining 
 359   
 360                      for field in url_query[rname]: 
 361                          if field in table.fields: 
 362                              for op in url_query[rname][field]: 
 363                                  values = url_query[rname][field][op] 
 364                                  if field == xml.UID and xml.domain_mapping: 
 365                                      uids = [xml.import_uid(v) for v in values] 
 366                                      values = uids 
 367                                  if op == "eq": 
 368                                      if len(values) == 1: 
 369                                          query = (table[field] == values[0]) 
 370                                      elif len(values): 
 371                                          query = (table[field].belongs(values)) 
 372                                  elif op == "ne": 
 373                                      if len(values) == 1: 
 374                                          query = (table[field] != values[0]) 
 375                                      elif len(values): 
 376                                          query = (~(table[field].belongs(values))) 
 377                                  elif op == "lt": 
 378                                      v = values[-1] 
 379                                      query = (table[field] < v) 
 380                                  elif op == "le": 
 381                                      v = values[-1] 
 382                                      query = (table[field] <= v) 
 383                                  elif op == "gt": 
 384                                      v = values[-1] 
 385                                      query = (table[field] > v) 
 386                                  elif op == "ge": 
 387                                      v = values[-1] 
 388                                      query = (table[field] >= v) 
 389                                  elif op == "in": 
 390                                      query = None 
 391                                      for v in values: 
 392                                          q = (table[field].contains(v)) 
 393                                          if query: 
 394                                              query = query | q 
 395                                          else: 
 396                                              query = q 
 397                                      query = (query) 
 398                                  elif op == "ex": 
 399                                      query = None 
 400                                      for v in values: 
 401                                          q = (~(table[field].contains(v))) 
 402                                          if query: 
 403                                              query = query & q 
 404                                          else: 
 405                                              query = q 
 406                                      query = (query) 
 407                                  elif op == "like": 
 408                                      query = None 
 409                                      for v in values: 
 410                                          q = (table[field].lower().contains(v.lower())) 
 411                                          if query: 
 412                                              query = query | q 
 413                                          else: 
 414                                              query = q 
 415                                      query = (query) 
 416                                  elif op == "unlike": 
 417                                      query = None 
 418                                      for v in values: 
 419                                          q = (~(table[field].lower().contains(v.lower()))) 
 420                                          if query: 
 421                                              query = query & q 
 422                                          else: 
 423                                              query = q 
 424                                      query = (query) 
 425                                  else: 
 426                                      continue 
 427                                  self.__query = self.__query & query 
 428   
 429                  # Filter 
 430                  if filter: 
 431                      self.__query = self.__query & filter 
 432   
 433                  # Deletion status 
 434                  if deletion_status in self.table.fields: 
 435                      remaining = (self.table[deletion_status] == False) 
 436                      self.__query = self.__query & remaining 
 437   
 438          else: 
 439              raise NotImplementedError 
 440   
 441          return self.__query

 849                          self.__dbg("pre-process returned an error - aborting")

 859                  self.__dbg("pre-process returned an error - aborting")

 863          if r.representation <> "html":

 867          handler = None 
 868          if bypass: 
 869              self.__dbg("bypass directive - skipping method handler") 
 870          else: 
 871              if r.method and r.custom_action: 
 872                  self.__dbg("custom method %s" % r.method) 
 873                  handler = r.custom_action 
 874              elif r.http == "GET": 
 875                  handler = self.__get(r) 
 876              elif r.http == "PUT": 
 877                  handler = self.__put(r) 
 878              elif r.http == "POST": 
 879                  handler = self.__post(r) 
 880              elif r.http == "DELETE": 
 881                  handler = self.__delete(r) 
 882              else: 
 883                  raise HTTP(501, body=self.ERROR.BAD_METHOD) 
 884              if handler is not None: 
 885                  self.__dbg("method handler found - executing request") 
 886                  output = handler(r, **attr) 
 887              else: 
 888                  self.__dbg("no method handler - finalizing request") 
 889   
 890          # Post-process 
 891          if hooks is not None: 
 892              postprocess = hooks.get("postp", None) 
 893          if postprocess is not None: 
 894              self.__dbg("post-processing") 
 895              output = postprocess(r, output) 
 896   
 897          if output is not None and isinstance(output, dict): 
 898              output.update(jr=r) 
 899   
 900          # Redirection (makes no sense in GET) 
 901          if r.next is not None and r.http != "GET" or r.method == "delete": 
 902              if isinstance(output, dict): 
 903                  form = output.get("form", None) 
 904                  if form and form.errors: 
 905                      return output

 907              r.session.flash = r.response.flash 
 908              r.session.confirmation = r.response.confirmation 
 909              r.session.error = r.response.error 
 910              r.session.warning = r.response.warning

 913          return output
